-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: A sum of nonnegative extended reals is smaller than a given extended real if and only if every finite subsum is smaller than it. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
